snippet.title: Mayo Mayo - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Mayo Mayo - (c) Exkee - Reveal Trailer - October 2024 

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3228550/Mayo_Mayo/

FIND ALL OUR LINKS: https://linktr.ee/mayo_mayo_game 

Dive into the colorful world of Mayo Mayo, inspired by fast food, sauces and condiments. Play with Blue, Mustard, Mayo, Wasabi, and Ketchup in this Match-4 puzzle that will challenge your reflexes and wits.

Chain clever combos, solve captivating puzzles, and break records across four different game modes: Puzzle, Survival, Multiplayer and Training.

Whether you’re a seasoned competitor or a newcomer curious to explore this genre, Mayo Mayo offers an experience that’s both accessible and full of depth.
